item.title: Exxon says Canada LNG plans to cost up to C$25 billion

ROI Land Investments Ltd. Closes $6,000,000 Equity Investment
item.description: [ACN Newswire] - >, November 12th, 2014 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ROI Land Investments Ltd. (OTCQB:ROII - News) ("ROI" or the "Company"), a diversified real estate land development investment company, announces that it has raised US$6,155,475.00 in equity from qualified individual and institutional investors. The Company intends to use these funds for implementation of the Company's business plan to acquire pre-zoned land ready for residential and commercial development as well as general working capital. The Company continues evaluating significant land opportunities within the province of Quebec and with additional special focus on British Columbia, Canada.
